url.title: URL
url.description: The URL of the WFS server.

nameProperty.title: Name property
nameProperty.description: The name of the WFS attribute from which to derive the names of the catalog items in this group.This property must be set.

useFeatureID.title: Use feature i d
useFeatureID.description: Gets or sets whether to use WFS "feature ID" for retrieving features. On by default, disable to handleID-less features on some servers. When disabled, nameProperty is used for matching features, and will giveincorrect results if its values are not unique.

groupByProperty.title: Group by property
groupByProperty.description: The name of the property by which to group the catalog items in this group.  If this propertyis undefined, all catalog items are added at the top level.

dataCustodian.title: Data custodian
dataCustodian.description: A description of the custodian of the data sources in this group.This property is an HTML string that must be sanitized before display to the user.

blacklist.title: Blacklist
blacklist.description: A hash of names of blacklisted data layers.  A layer that appears in this hashwill not be shown to the user.  In this hash, the keys should be the Title of the layers to blacklist,and the values should be "true".
